actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1201 of title 18, United States Code (relating to kidnapping), to remove from such section the exception relating to abduction of a minor child by a parent.

summary.text: Provides that the abduction of a minor child by a parent shall constitute the offense of kidnapping. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 1201(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1201 of title 18, United States Code (relating to kidnapping), to remove from such section the exception relating to abduction of a minor child by a parent.
